reviewText:
Just what I wanted, thank you.

Sincerely,

Michael Browne

this version of Super Mario World is dubbed in French as many of you have pointed out. there is an English version available by going to the link I've provided below:

http://www.amazon.com/Captain-New-Super-Mario-World/dp/B000UUX2R8/ref=sr_1_2?s=movies-tv&ie=UTF8&qid=1341431769&sr=1-2&keywords=captain+n

I will point out that the English version also comes with the 3rd (and final) season of Captain N: The Game Master. which the DVD does give you the option of watching both cartoons either together or independently of each other, so if you're someone who doesn't like or care for Captain N, worry not cause you don't have to suffer through those cartoons if you so choose to. hope this review helps any of you who've purchased the French version of Super Mario World by accident
I am not pleased with the description.  There is nothing to tell you that it is in FRENCH when ordering!  My children are so disappointed.
the service was fine, but this entire collection is in french, which was not made clear to me in the process.  My son was very disappointed, and I had to return it because it was no use to us.

We ordered this product twice, once with a Customer Service Rep, told them we received the French version and wanted it exchanged for English.
The second order arrived and it was also in French.  There is not an a Box set in English, but we could not find it in the product description.
